Bay

Also known as: Baie, Bay Laurel, Bay Tree, Daphne, Grecian Laurel, Laurel, Laurier d'Apollon, Laurier Sauce, Lorbeer, Noble Laurel, Roman Laurel, Bay Leaf, Sweet Bay, True Laurel


Laurus nobilis
